name: Silly Sausage in Meat Land
summary:
Meet our stretchy pooch: Silly Sausage in his adventure through Meat Land.

Swipe-based controls will allow you to stretch through the air changing direction as you go. Latch onto a surface and your dachshund will retract to that spot.

Having an infinitely stretchy body is pretty handy!....but it's not all plain sailing. Your exposed body is vulnerable to all sorts of meat cutting instruments so don't overstretch yourself or you could end up butchered!

videos.title: Silly Sausage in Meat Land: Out NOW!
